Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob red and blue loop has 18” of hard packed base . Looks like we will be skiing late into the Spring!

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: I went around Cedar Trace and did a few laps of Buck's Run this afternoon. Lots of coverage. Buck's is in great shape, Cedar Trace was OK but pretty slow and a bit sticky in parts. The trails off the golf course would be great if they got around to grooming them. Rod Little

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 chairlifts and the rope tow.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were power-tilled and tracked Tuesday morning. Conditions are excellent.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It looks like a fantastic day to ski. The temperature is forecast to go above 20 degrees today and we are supposed to receive a few inches of snow during the day. The snow surface is machine groomed and the snow quality is excellent thanks to the fresh snow and sustained cold. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. We are proud to welcome the 70 plus ski club for their 40th annual gathering. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
